item.description:
I have a diverse background in coursework and work experience, spanning topics from Data Analytics, IT strategy, Marketing Management, Project management and more. With my background in technology and the numerous leadership positions I have held in extracurricular experience I have developed some keen conflict resolution and teamwork skills that are tailored to the world of IT and Finance.

I have found that nothing brings me more joy than meeting new people, developing new relationships, solving problems, and contributing to the overall growth of a business.
